title: 旧约 - 约伯记(Job) - 第 15 章
subTitle: 旧约 -- 约伯记(Job) -- 第 15 章 ( 本篇共有 42 章 )

lineList.en: Then answered Eliphaz the Temanite, and said,
lineList.cn: 毯螅人以利法回答说，

lineList.en: Should a wise man utter vain knowledge, and fill his belly with the east wind?
lineList.cn: 智慧人岂可用虚空的知识回答，用东风充满肚腹呢。

lineList.en: Should he reason with unprofitable talk? or with speeches wherewith he can do no good?
lineList.cn: 他岂可用无益的话，和无济于事的言语，理论呢。

lineList.en: Yea, thou castest off fear, and restrainest prayer before God.
lineList.cn: 你是废弃敬畏的意，在神面前阻止敬虔的心。

lineList.en: For thy mouth uttereth thine iniquity, and thou choosest the tongue of the crafty.
lineList.cn: 你的罪孽指教你的口。你选用诡诈人的舌头。

lineList.en: Thine own mouth condemneth thee, and not I: yea, thine own lips testify against thee.
lineList.cn: 你自己的口定你有罪，并非是我。你自己的嘴，见证你的不是。

lineList.en: Art thou the first man that was born? or wast thou made before the hills?
lineList.cn: 你岂是头一个被生的人吗。你受造在诸山之先吗。

lineList.en: Hast thou heard the secret of God? and dost thou restrain wisdom to thyself?
lineList.cn: 你曾听见神的密旨吗。你还将智慧独自得尽吗。

lineList.en: What knowest thou, that we know not? what understandest thou, which is not in us?
lineList.cn: 你知道什么是我们不知道的呢。你明白什么是我们不明白的呢。

lineList.en: With us are both the grayheaded and very aged men, much elder than thy father.
lineList.cn: 我们这里有白发的，和年纪老迈的，比你父亲还老。

lineList.en: Are the consolations of God small with thee? is there any secret thing with thee?
lineList.cn: 神用温和的话安慰你，你以为太小吗。

lineList.en: Why doth thine heart carry thee away? and what do thy eyes wink at,
lineList.cn: 你的心为何将你逼去。你的眼为何冒出火星。

lineList.en: That thou turnest thy spirit against God, and lettest such words go out of thy mouth?
lineList.cn: 使你的灵反对神，也任你的口发这言语。

lineList.en: What is man, that he should be clean? and he which is born of a woman, that he should be righteous?
lineList.cn: 人是什么，竟算为洁净呢。妇人所生的是什么，竟算为义呢。

lineList.en: Behold, he putteth no trust in his saints; yea, the heavens are not clean in his sight.
lineList.cn: 神不信靠他的众圣者。在他眼前，天也不洁净。

lineList.en: How much more abominable and filthy is man, which drinketh iniquity like water?
lineList.cn: 何况那污秽可憎，喝罪孽如水的世人呢。

lineList.en: I will shew thee, hear me; and that which I have seen I will declare;
lineList.cn: 我指示你，你要听。我要述说所看见的。

lineList.en: Which wise men have told from their fathers, and have not hid it:
lineList.cn: 就是智慧人从列祖所受，传说而不隐瞒的。

lineList.en: Unto whom alone the earth was given, and no stranger passed among them.
lineList.cn: （这地惟独赐给他们，并没有外人从他们中间经过）。

lineList.en: The wicked man travaileth with pain all his days, and the number of years is hidden to the oppressor.
lineList.cn: 恶人一生之日劬劳痛苦，强暴人一生的年数也是如此。

lineList.en: A dreadful sound is in his ears: in prosperity the destroyer shall come upon him.
lineList.cn: 惊吓的声音常在他耳中。在平安时，抢夺的必临到他那里。

lineList.en: He believeth not that he shall return out of darkness, and he is waited for of the sword.
lineList.cn: 他不信自己能从黑暗中转回，他被刀剑等候。

lineList.en: He wandereth abroad for bread, saying, Where is it? he knoweth that the day of darkness is ready at his hand.
lineList.cn: 他漂流在外求食，说，那里有食物呢。他知道黑暗的日子，在他手边预备好了。

lineList.en: Trouble and anguish shall make him afraid; they shall prevail against him, as a king ready to the battle.
lineList.cn: 急难困苦叫他害怕，而且胜了他，好像君王预备上阵一样。

lineList.en: For he stretcheth out his hand against God, and strengtheneth himself against the Almighty.
lineList.cn: 他伸手攻击神，以骄傲攻击全能者。

lineList.en: He runneth upon him, even on his neck, upon the thick bosses of his bucklers:
lineList.cn: 挺着颈项，用盾牌的厚凸面，向全能者直闯。

lineList.en: Because he covereth his face with his fatness, and maketh collops of fat on his flanks.
lineList.cn: 是因他的脸蒙上脂油，腰积成肥肉。

lineList.en: And he dwelleth in desolate cities, and in houses which no man inhabiteth, which are ready to become heaps.
lineList.cn: 他曾住在荒凉城邑，无人居住，将成乱堆的房屋。

lineList.en: He shall not be rich, neither shall his substance continue, neither shall he prolong the perfection thereof upon the earth.
lineList.cn: 他不得富足，财物不得常存，产业在地上也不加增。

lineList.en: He shall not depart out of darkness; the flame shall dry up his branches, and by the breath of his mouth shall he go away.
lineList.cn: 他不得出离黑暗。火焰要将他的枝子烧乾。因神口中的气，他要灭亡（灭亡原文作走去）。

lineList.en: Let not him that is deceived trust in vanity: for vanity shall be his recompence.
lineList.cn: 他不用倚靠虚假欺哄自己，因虚假必成为他的报应。

lineList.en: It shall be accomplished before his time, and his branch shall not be green.
lineList.cn: 他的日期未到之先，这事必成就。他的枝子不得青绿。

lineList.en: He shall shake off his unripe grape as the vine, and shall cast off his flower as the olive.
lineList.cn: 他必像葡萄树的葡萄，未熟而落。又像橄榄树的花，一开而谢。

lineList.en: For the congregation of hypocrites shall be desolate, and fire shall consume the tabernacles of bribery.
lineList.cn: 原来不敬虔之辈必无生育。受贿赂之人的帐棚必被火烧。

lineList.en: They conceive mischief, and bring forth vanity, and their belly prepareth deceit.
lineList.cn: 他们所怀的是毒害，所生的是罪孽，心里所豫备的是诡诈。
